attributes.contentHtml:
Oh no another scamming discord server ay?

Firstly At Via - Here's why you don't trust people by giving you free nodes ;
I have been scammed by this discord server. After three days of being a investor on Raided Hosting helping out my friends. Then after ViaHost came alive and was dying a lot I came on their server and checked them out. They were absolutely horrible, really i'm not joking - theres even a winterhoax thread about it. A few days later when SceuGe joined, everything started growing on Via because he was giving free VPSs (16GB ram). Then I was a developer + administrator of it just to help them out a bit and tell them what they are doing wrong. When I was a developer on Via I was developing some sites like the main page and trying to make a client panel, when we announced it to the whole server that we are going to use it on ScueGe's nodes to host it on, ScueGe'd was so bothered about it that he literally copy all the files and use it for Host Horizon then shutting down the VPSs and the host had to be shut down.

At Horizon Hosting
Here we at, at Host Horizon. ScecuGe the main owner of Horizon seen my work on the other discord hosting guild, and wanted me to be staff. I did not want to participate with them as he didn't give me my files plus coding that I did on the other vpss for sites. After him keep saying for me to be a investor / executive, I said "NO" because since he is investing other hosts why not do it for yourself then??. It makes no sense at all. Why would he want me to invest his host that has a stolen src on their "not ready site". SceuGe said why do you not want to be part of the team.. I said it's because I do not trust you anymore. When I didn't want to be investing him and his host. A few days later, I had nothing to do except from maybe checking out some other hosts, and the only host I could check out was Horizon so I DM'd SecuGe'd again and said can I apply for the team this time? And he gave me the invite and gave me the roles (management and CFO & COO) straight away?? Still again why would anyone do that. It had 50 members so I was like I think I could help this host out by designing the channels and creating more information about the host.

Working at.. Host Horizon?
Okay yes, I still had nothing to do but the guy was pretty nice to me and I was the investor of their host.
I bought them a starter node (De1) which had 30GB of RAM from hetzner. His management team was very happy and the userbase was happy about it to - but the userbase didn't know about that it would be coming to a bad end. A few days later, just when I am offline - I've been pinged and notified to do many things that I didn't get paid for. They kept asking me to pay to daft (Co Owner of the host) when he said he is gonna pay me.

Heres Daft trying to force me to invest him something: http://prntscr.com/v7c5l1
Here's Daft trying to force me to give him money for a promotion?? : http://prntscr.com/v7c7z0

I also have been told to put the root password (ssh access) in the executive-only category section multiple times, so I did since I got it for the owners to invest. After me not noticing, they have figured out the password for my hetzner account. (the ssh password was the same as the hetzner cp acc). Guess what they did, shutting down the hetzner nodes and fake deleting the servers. Even though i didnt have access to the admin panel.. They kept blaming on me in announcements; http://prntscr.com/v7celh (22:13) , http://prntscr.com/v7cf61 (wtf) , http://prntscr.com/v7cfkc (sainty? Could it be him?) , http://prntscr.com/v7cg5z (Bad is a supporter for me for some reason) , http://prntscr.com/v7ch65 (MORE announcements information) ; I couldn't say much about them stealing arc money because I do not have much proof of them stealing arc money. http://prntscr.com/v7cisa (Screenshot of me saying that I have a backup since thats why i got a node backup) , http://prntscr.com/v7cjg9 (dms of me having no admin panel): http://prntscr.com/v7ckhl
And here's more of that ^ http://prntscr.com/v7ckq3 , http://prntscr.com/v7cl4s

Got my staff friend to be fake trusted - http://prntscr.com/v7clho
http://prntscr.com/v7cm4e - http://prntscr.com/v7cmja (eraters even banning him from all of our hosting servers, even no one is going up for scuege) http://prntscr.com/v7cnvd (my friend pretending to be on exe's side) After them saying that the hetzner account got suspended for suspicous activity ?? wut do they mean. http://prntscr.com/v7cogs , http://prntscr.com/v7cp5c (their sites got completely fcked up because one of their administrators that are on our teams leaked it for being scammers) http://prntscr.com/v7cpu1 (using my-licenses ). Trying to gain trust, http://prntscr.com/v7cq9x.

Here are the messages I sent for the group I made at first:
I sent this "Listen here, @Daftscientist you think I would do this cause of a destruction. Well would I do this? No. Because I dont give free nodes as bobkabab is sending dms of yours scuege. Bobkabab is saying that you are trying to say that I'm a scammer and no kind of a investor plus saying "I get why he is giving away free nodes" . Well no i do not give free nodes lmao i only do that if you are my friend and really want me to do some exe stuffl ike coding site. well actually i still want all my code back. Oreo,BobKabab and other staff are going to work me and eraters - a new host if i do not get accepted again. I still dont know why I got blamed firstly. Just because a no chargeback means you have to get angry just like me and remove all of my roles + banning ip from panel. I do not understand-"
He says "leave this.... daft leave? @ping"

And he says that i am trying to gain his trust again but I am not here's why:
http://prntscr.com/v7crvg - No gain trust part
http://prntscr.com/v7cs6k - Full messages part
I kinda hoped for him to not understand me...

**This is for the people who trust me*
Oh yea forgot to tell ya, they are doing everything without Private Policy and ToS they said from now on. ??????? I'm losing brain cells ok
RusJS I've never had acsess to your PayPal/hosthinzer acc. I've never had acsess to anything yours
RusJS we used the lisence place before we knew it was bad.
My eyes hurt
That's just mad
Vertoxen madly not true. Sorry but it is fake. Most of it. Some is true
We have a privacy and TOS. But when u joined u moved them to a staff category.
I can put a link here if you want
I forsed him to pay me BC he just said that he had made 54$ from a join for resources. And he had just said he would pay me. At the end of this he DMed me saying it was a troll.
This is a breach of our staff policy. You have shared confidential information with people not inside our business. Is is against what u signed up for. You have broken many rules
Daftscientist And the owner of your company has commited many crimes that could get him landed in jail! such fun
Tomas true but he mostly did those deeds behind my back.
If you wanna know what is true and what is not please DM me. Some is true I admit but most is not. I just cant be botherd to type
So the owner had money for nodes and investing into other hosts, while before he couldn't even afford WHMCS?
Withdrawal apparently he bought like a pot of lurk resources that he can create servers with
Withdrawal I think he's abusing like I just said
wow i had higher hopes in you daft
maybe get rid of secuge
luca I'm considering... I don't think so... I dunno....so hard....

Daftscientist all the crap he is doing, yeah
i personally have got a node from him, i know bad decision, but i mean it worked fine
he told me not to tell anybody
and one day he just randomly said that he is shutting it down. i have taken a backup of my important data but i mean he is saying "he cant afford it", like really

I think SecuGe Is abusing ArvanCloud or whatever the fuck his VPSes are hosted on, he can pay Â£70 for a VPS but can't afford to refund me $3? He scammed me for $3, made me pay for VPSes and then deleted them without refunding me.
J0SH yeah they r using arvancloud
